title: Seeking Out Disagreement, Buster Benson
description:
Buster Benson is the latest writer to tackle the epidemic of polarisation and breakdown of civil discourse with his new book, 'Why Are We Yelling?'.

In this conversation with Rebel Wisdom's David Fuller, they talk about how he was stunned by the election of Donald Trump, and then went on a journey to challenge his views and understand why others saw the world so differently.

Check out the book: https://busterbenson.com/whyareweyelling/

Other films mentioned in this interview:

The Science and Psychology of Polarisation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EUNHj5eh7BM

Impossible Conversations, Peter Boghossian, Helen Pluckrose, James Lindsay & Letter.Wiki: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=08RoXYz9_UU&t=335s

To get access to more exclusive content and to join this evolving conversation, become a Rebel Wisdom member: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

You can listen to a podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com/ 

We also have a Rebel Wisdom Discord discussion channel: https://discord.gg/RK4MeYW
